question: I am 18 years old and had the Depo Privera Shot a year and 4 months ago.  Stopped it 4 months ago. Since then, I just started what I think is my period today..,(spotting, we'll see).  My question is since stopping Depo, I have had almost constant swelling and pain in my ankles and hands.  Ankles are red and splotchy.  There is diabetes in my  family hostory, (g'father, father's side).  I am a waitress so therefore; am on my feet all day.  Elevating them at night seems to help only a little.  Could this be an after-effect of stopping the Depo?  One of my best friends at age 17 took depo and as soon as she got it, it triggered an unfortunate bout of Lupus with a lot of complications for her.  Is it common for a medication as this to un-mask any other under lying health issues?Danielle
title: after effects of stopping depoprivera
